projects.title: Tiny DB
projects.description: A minimal key-value database built from scratch. Supports basic CRUD operations, persistence, and a simple query language.

projects.title: Rate Limiter
projects.description: Implementation of various rate limiting algorithms including token bucket, sliding window, and leaky bucket with Redis backend.

projects.title: Monkey Interpreter
projects.description: A tree-walking interpreter for the Monkey programming language. Includes lexer, parser, and evaluator.

projects.title: Distributed Cache
projects.description: A distributed caching system with consistent hashing, replication, and basic fault tolerance.

projects.title: Load Balancer
projects.description: HTTP load balancer with multiple strategies: round-robin, least connections, and weighted distribution.

projects.title: Task Queue
projects.description: A simple but reliable task queue with workers, retries, and dead letter handling.
